description.content: Required attributes to bind to the input element.

{
  /**
   * unique id used for the input element.
   */
  id: '...',

  /**
   *  String to use as plceholer. This should always be 
   *  an empty string. This is is only used to check if state
   *  of placeholder visibility.
   */
  placeholder: '...',

  /**
   * Label for accessibility.
   */
  aria-label: '...',

  /**
   * Boolean. Indicates readonly element.
   */
  readonly: '...',

  /**
   * Boolean, Indicates disabled element.
   */
  disabled: '...',
}

scopes.name: classNames
scopes.description: Array of default class names used for the input element

name: prepend
description: Prepend element inside the border of the input field.

name: append
description: Append element inside the the border of the input field.

name: before
description: Add element before the input field, outside the border.

name: after
description: Add element after the input field, outside the border.

name: label
description: Use for custom label. Ignores label props.

name: error
description: Similar with append slot but will only render when error prop is true.

name: errorMessage
description: Add custom element for error message. This will replace the hint prop/slot if error is true.

name: hint
description: Adds hint at the bottom of the component.
